scripts.linux:mock: npm run grunt && cd dist && xvfb-run -a --server-args="-screen 0 1024x768x24" node ./MockApp.js
scripts.linux:start: npm run grunt && cd dist && xvfb-run -a --server-args="-screen 0 1024x768x24" node ./App.js
scripts.win:mock: npm run grunt && cd dist && node ./MockApp.js
scripts.win:start: npm run grunt && cd dist && node ./App.js
